name: ここは楽園荘3
summary: His girlfriend from #1 came back. Now what is he going to do since he already has a girlfriend from #2. He will have to decide which one he wants, but in the mean time, he still enjoys the girls around him. This time, he can pick one of two girlfriends or stay the same as before.
info:
• 中文名: 这里是乐园庄3
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1998/05/29
